title-group.article-title: On the Specification and Estimation of Macroeconomic Policy Functions

abstract.p: This paper reviews the empirical literature on the determination of macroeconomic policy. The research on the derivation and estimation of reaction functions for the monetary and fiscal policies of different nations is surveyed. The related work on identifying the weights of the welfare function of policy makers also is summarized. Studies of central bank transactions in foreign exchange markets and the sterilization of their monetary impact are examined. The integration of policy functions into macroeconomic models also is reviewed.
